pyenigma_api.plugboard.PlugBoard.remove_short¶

PlugBoard.remove_short(short_tuple: Tuple[int, int]) → None¶

Remove the provided short from the plugboard

Parameters:

short_tuple (tuple) – The tuple of short elements to be removed.

Raises:

KeyError – If the provided short is not present already in the plugboard
